title: Windows 10  (AIO) x64 -22in1-RUS-ENG by m0nkrus-=TEAM OS=-
description:
[b]Windows 10 -22in1- (AIO) by m0nkrus (x64) [Ru / En] (2015)[/b]

[img]http://savepic.ru/7968394.png[/img]

[b]Software Version: 10.0.10240.16384 
Official website: http://microsoft.ru 
By assembling: m0nkrus 
Language: English / Russian 
Treatment: no 

System requirements: 
* CPU at least 1 GHz processor or SoC 
* 2 GB RAM * 20 GB free hard drive 
* Video card with support for DirectX 9 or higher and 1.0 driver WDDM 
* Display with a resolution of 800 x 600 

Description: This assembly is designed for those who have a license, or want to use any other, they preferred, method of activation. 
The assembly is based on the official final distributions and includes minor changes affecting mostly not installed on the product, but only to the installation process.

The composition of the assembly
This assembly includes 11 Russian editions and 11 of the English editions of Windows 10 for 64-bit (x64) core: 
- Windows 10 Enterprise x64 Russian
 - Windows 10 Enterprise x64 English 
- Windows 10 Enterprise N x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 Enterprise N x64 English 
- Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB x64 English 
- Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB N x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB N x64 English 
- Windows 10 Education x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 Education x64 English 
- Windows 10 Education N x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 Education N x64 English 
- the Windows 10 Professional x64 Russian 
- the Windows 10 Professional x64 English 
- the Windows 10 Professional N x64 Russian 
- the Windows 10 Professional N x64 English 
- the Windows 10 Home x64 Russian 
- the Windows 10 Home x64 English 
- the Windows 10 Home N x64 Russian 
- Windows 10 N x64 English Home 
- Windows 10 x64 Russian Language Single 
- Windows 10 Single Language x64 English


Some features of the assembly
- At the heart of the assembly are distributions of Windows 10, posted on MSDN twenty-ninth of July 2015. 
- In this assembly does not include anything that would make it possible to register and activate its member operating systems. All these procedures are performed only by external means. 
- The System Restore service, run from the installation media, and recovery service that is built into the system, an integrated module of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) 10, which significantly expands the possibilities of resuscitation system . 
- Fixed feature of Windows Installer 10, because of which in the multilingual assembly, when you start the installation from the existing system, there was no choice of language installer interface. In this assembly language interface is automatically determined based on the language of the running operating system. 
- With editions Enterprise, Enterprise N, Enterlprise LTSB and Enterprise LTSB N remove the restriction, because of which at the stage of the installation was impossible to enter the serial number. 
- After installation, you get a chance switch the interface language from English to Russian and back standard means Windows 10 (except edition Home Single Language). 
- To the Editor Home Single Language added to the script, allowing users to switch the interface language from English to Russian and back without loss of license. 
- When you start the installation of Windows 10 out of the existing system with the Russian interface, click porting applications from the old to the new system will be blocked. Transfer can be only personal files. Nevertheless, though, and will have to reinstall the software completely, in a folder Windows.Old old system will continue, and if necessary it will be possible to pull out plug, configuration files, and so on. If the original system, with which you want to update, initially has the English interface, the destination of the transfer application will be available. 
- Made minor changes to the interface of the installer, correcting flaws Microsoft programmers.
